short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate final prices with fees and easily compare prices on Amazon while browsing Nellis Auction

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smart shopping assistant for Nellis Auction - calculate final prices with fees and compare prices on Amazon instantly.

Detailed description:
Make smarter purchasing decisions on Nellis Auction with this helpful shopping assistant.

Key Shopping Features:

1. Smart Price Calculator
- See final prices instantly including all fees
- Premium (15%) automatically calculated
- Tax (8.25%) added to total
- Real-time price updates
- Hover over any price to see complete breakdown

2. Price Comparison with Amazon
- One-click Amazon price check
- Compare auction prices with market prices
- Quick Amazon search button on each item
- Opens search results in a new tab
- Make informed buying decisions

Perfect for:
- Smart shoppers looking for deals
- Auction buyers avoiding hidden fees
- Resellers checking market values
- Anyone wanting to save time on calculations

Why Use This Extension:
- No more manual fee calculations
- Instant market price comparison
- Clean and simple interface
- Works automatically
- No registration needed
- No data collection - respects your privacy

How to Use:
1. Browse Nellis Auction as usual
2. Hover over prices to see final cost with all fees
3. Hover over item titles to see Amazon search option
4. Click Amazon icon to compare prices

Note: Works on https://nellisauction.com/dashboard/auctions/active
